name: Mysterious Mine
description:
You came to explore an abandoned mine to see what happened to it. But something still lurks inside the shadows... and the mine isn't very stable anymore...

Can you flip all 7 breaker switches and get to the elevator before the mine collapses?

Note: If you are rating the game for Ludum Dare, download v1.0. The postjam version comes with features added after the end of the jam.

Controls:

  • WASD to move
  • Shift to sprint
  • Left Click to interact
